about.title: About Me
about.content: Fullstack Developer with a diploma in Full Stack Software Development from Code Institute. My experience as a gaming coach has sharpened my problem-solving skills and ability to adapt to different challenges. I build responsive, user-friendly web applications and I have an eye for details. I value clarity and efficiency in my work and enjoy creating solutions that work seamlessly for users.

education.title: 2024 Full Stack Software Development Diploma
education.content: Code Institute. Full-stack comprehensive course covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, and Django. Advanced full-stack development with React. The program gave me the skills to build dynamic, responsive web applications from scratch and integrate frontend and backend technologies into complete solutions.

education.title: 2023 Self-Taught Developer
education.content: Developed foundational full-stack skills through self-directed learning with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python. Built a habit of continuous learning and adaptability that prepared me for structured training at Code Institute.

experience.title: 2024 AI Trainer and Senior Reviewer at Outlier (Scale AI)
experience.content: Worked on multiple RLHF projects as a Senior Reviewer. Led side-by-side evaluations, rubric tuning, and final quality checks. Reviewed prompts, rewrites, and model outputs to improve accuracy, clarity, tone, and safety. Mentored reviewers and flagged edge cases to refine guidelines.

experience.title: 2023 Video Content Creator and Coach at AimLab.gg
experience.content: Created personalized coaching content by video. Answered client questions and delivered actionable feedback. Helped build a supportive learning community and improved engagement through clear communication.

experience.title: 2019 Coach and Scriptwriter at ProGuides
experience.content: Delivered one-on-one coaching for Valorant and Fortnite to more than 2000 clients. Wrote engaging video scripts that combined expert tips with storytelling for an audience of over one million subscribers.

projects.title: Tic Tac Tactics
projects.description: Valorant Tic-Tac-Tactics combines the strategy of Valorant with the simplicity of Tic-Tac-Toe. Built as a fun, lightweight web game for both Valorant fans and casual players.

projects.title: Star Review
projects.description: Peer review platform for developers to collaborate, give feedback, and improve code quality. Suitable for both beginners and experienced devs.

projects.title: Coach Profile
projects.description: A vibrant gaming profile that showcases coaching background, skills, and experiences.

projects.title: Snake
projects.description: Classic Snake implemented in Python and rendered in a mock terminal on Heroku.

projects.title: eBuddies
projects.description: Community platform to connect gamers with shared interests. Focus on a welcoming space, sharing experiences, and building connections.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Personal portfolio that showcases projects, skills, and experience. Serves as a digital resume and demo space.

hackathons.title: All-inclusive
hackathons.description: Frontend developer and designer. Built an accessible, intuitive UI. The project promotes inclusivity by design and offers accessibility-focused education.

hackathons.title: 12 Days of Quizmas
hackathons.description: Frontend dev and UX designer. Designed and implemented the UI for a quiz game about Christmas traditions.

hackathons.title: Jedi Blades
hackathons.description: Fullstack developer and co-scrum master. Built a Star Wars themed encyclopedia where users explore lightsabers and their wielders.

hackathons.title: Fund Frontier
hackathons.description: Created the UI for a Net Present Value calculator to compare up to three projects. Helped with README and flow design.

hackathons.title: RemindiCare
hackathons.description: Led frontend and UX. Used Figma, wireframes, and user testing. The app helps patients track medications and get reminders.

hackathons.title: Cupid's Quill
hackathons.description: Worked across the stack, focused on landing page animation and the About page. Generates gift ideas from personality inputs.
